column5: I wrote a post on the weekend about getting my first gar now today i got my first bowfin it was about 18 inches and fought pretty hard nice surprise catch.
Good stuff, John. Discovering new fishies is always fun. And no, you don't want to be lipping either of those two.
I havnet caught either species... Don't let them toothy fish bite you!

I caught a massive bowfin last weekend the thing was at least 10 pounds... My fishing partner asked if I wanted it netted...   I woulda cut my line if it didn't have my a 12 dollar lure hanging out of it mouth. In hindsite i really should have taken a pictutre of it...  It was kinda cool looking in a scary way.
Great job, i have caught a small gar, but never a bowfin.
I've only caught small gars....but my biggest bowfin is around the 5lb mark....absolutely love catching them...great fighters.  Congrats on what's turning out to be a wild week for ya.
